Resolves # .

## Basics

- [ ] At least 80% Unit Test Coverage
- [ ] Documentation for:
    - [ ] new functionality;
    - [ ] functionality changes;
    - [ ] deprecations;
    - [ ] code (aka docstrings);
- [ ] Code Review by another member.


*Note*: No pull requests will be accepted that do not meet the above criteria.
